data.name: EzBench Benchmark
data.detailed_description:
General Info:

Ezbench is a FREE Stress test tool with next generation technologies from Unreal Engine 5.
Test your computer versus 8K textures, Cinematic quality assets and raytracing.

EzBench started out as a easter jam project and turned into a graphical stress test tool. It is still early in development and is worked on as a side project.
UI improvements, more scenes are coming.

The current version includes a stylized scene of a fantasy island. In the future we plan to add photorealistic scenes showcasing the true graphical capabilities of the engine. The current scene is a stress test rather than a showcase of the engine.

This tool is a stress test and does represent a worst case scenario. You should expect higher frame rates in optimized games.

FAQ:

What is the resolution?
- The stress test forces 1080P or 4K *render resolution* in order to ensure comparison .

What is a stress test?
- A stress test is designed to load the GPU as much as possible. In particular this test is extremely heavy on memory. A stress test is great for testing thermals or stability.

It isn't intended to showcase game performance, or graphical capabilities of the engine itself.

Will you add a Unreal Engine 5 Showcase later on?
- We might add a graphical showcase in June!

Are there more features planned?
Yes! We plan to add a torture test (Loop) as well as improving the UI. Including options to mute the game.


This tool was made by:

Ezekiel Hauge | Twitter: @Eztheory
- Environment
- Lighting
- Design

Chris Lucca | Twitter: @FlipLucca
- Sound Design
- Music

Pablo Muñoz | Twitter: @Shikopaleta
- Programming
- Technical Design

Marius Andre Elgsaas | Twitter: @Oppne
- VFX / Niagara
- Cavern Exterior

We strongly recommend using a video card with minimum 8GB of video memory.

Will give any PC a challenge. While it runs on lower end systems as well, this test will make your RTX 3090 sweat.

Logo by:
Kalin Mihaylov | Twitter: @Voodoo_KalinMih

data.short_description: Graphical Stress Test Tool. Test your computer versus 8K textures, Cinematic quality assets and raytracing. Guaranteed to make your computer sweat. Based on Unreal Engine 5.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 7th Gen Intel / Equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 (or AMD Equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: *Strongly recommend 8GB Vram* It may run on lower specs - however this is a very heavy benchmark tool. Do not expect stable, fluid frames even at minimum system requirements.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 10th Gen Intel / Equivalent
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3000 Series (or AMD Equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice:
This software tests the limits of your GPU, Memory and CPU.

In particular our "Extreme Mode" will cause extreme stress and high thermals on most chipsets.

Stability of your computer is not guaranteed, and any damages resulting from overheating or similar issues is the users sole responsibility.

The Developer is not to be held responsible for any damages or problems that may arise from usage of this software.
